comment: Alternate proof of ~ snex using Power Set ( ~ ax-pow ) instead of Pairing ( ~ ax-pr ). Unlike in the proof of ~ zfpair , Replacement ( ~ ax-rep ) is not needed. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
